title: Remove 6 selected gallery images and their grid slots

requirements.text: Remove the six selected images from the Gallery grid by deleting their corresponding entries from the gallery data source so the images no longer render and the grid reflows with no empty slots. The images to remove correspond to the elements at XPaths: (1) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[7]/img[1], (2) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[8]/img[1], (3) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[17]/img[1], (4) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[21]/img[1], (5) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[27]/img[1], (6) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[28]/img[1]. In the current code, these correspond to removing these `src` entries from `frontend/src/data/galleryImages.ts`: `generated/gallery-work-07.dim_1200x1600.jpg`, `generated/gallery-work-08.dim_1200x1600.jpg`, `generated/gallery-real-17.dim_1200x1600.jpg`, `generated/gallery-real-21.dim_1200x1600.jpg`, `generated/gallery-real-27.dim_1200x1600.jpg`, `generated/gallery-real-28.dim_1200x1600.jpg`.

quotes: Delete these pictures and their slots too.

acceptanceCriteria: The Gallery section no longer renders the 6 selected images in the grid.
The gallery grid has no blank/empty placeholders where those images used to be; remaining items reflow naturally.
The modal viewer continues to work for the remaining images (click-to-open and close behavior remains intact).
No other gallery elements are changed (e.g., keep the existing “View More” button link and behavior unchanged).

constraints: Apply the change ONLY to the 6 selected Gallery elements (i.e., remove only those images and their corresponding slots from the Gallery grid).

Do not modify immutable frontend paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Keep the single-actor backend architecture; no backend changes are needed for this request.
nonGoals: Deleting image files from the repository or assets directory; this request only requires removing them from the rendered page.
Changing any other Gallery content, layout, copy, or the “View More” button.
Adding new images to replace the removed ones.
